metadata.synopsis: Ironhand gnome merchant hiding in a smithy cellar
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load BGO_Main_A. Debug book "Quest Flags and Options" -> Act3 -> Ironhand Gnomes -> Setup a predefined company of gnomes -> 1. Set up Oppress Scene.Debug Book -> Go To Region -> Act3 -> WYR -> Ironhand gnomes hideout.Find merchant gnome and talk to him. If a crime dialog is started, mention Barcus or Wulbren or "I'm here to trade" option.
